_xResult.title: An Elegant Affair Chiffon Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made evening dress with soft cotton slipÂ
_xResult.longdesc:
Most say a picture is more beautiful than the things you see in person. However, this is not the case for you—and certainty not for this dress.

There is a way about you that draws people to you and the closer they get, the more exquisite your color, features, and demeanor become. As a very unique quality for a human to have, it is only right that you have a dress of the same nature.

 

This dress is a two piece outfit, as it comes with a strapless viscose sheath that is stretchy and soft to compliment the transparent chiffon. The outer shell is a kaftan style that features a daring side slit and a neckline that can be worn off-the-shoulder or bateau, depending on how you choose to style. 

 

For custom made requests regarding sizing, let Teyxo know your desired measurements using the button below.
